actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: To establish a commission to assist the Soviet Republics and nations of Eastern Europe during their transition to a market economy, democracy, and stable governments.
short_title: Commission on the Soviet Republics and Eastern Europe Act

summary.text: Commission on the Soviet Republics and Eastern Europe Act - Establishes the Commission on the Soviet Republics and Eastern Europe to assist the Soviet republics and Eastern European nations during their transition to market economies, democracy, and stable governments. Requires the Commission to: (1) evaluate the economic, political, and governmental institutions of the Soviet republics and Eastern European nations; and (2) submit specified recommendations, at the request of such governments, concerning restructuring of economies, conversion of military industries to promote production of consumer products, the contribution of natural resources to economic growth and development, and the use of barter and exchanges as substitutes for hard currency transactions.

titles.title: Commission on the Soviet Republics and Eastern Europe Act
To establish a commission to assist the Soviet Republics and nations of Eastern Europe during their transition to a market economy, democracy, and stable governments.
